name: Mirador
description:
-MIRADOR-


MIRADOR is the story of an adventurer who arrives at an mystery temple and gets through by killing monsters




Draw and Sheathe

When you Draw, your movement speed is reduced
When you Sheathe, your movement speed is increased
Enjoy various Plays!!





Combat


Analyze and dodge enemy patterns and defeat all enemies!






Stats and Skill


Upgrade stats and unlock skills to challenge stronger enemies!





Boss


Meet and defeat the most powerful enemies of each stage!





Death


Death always presents many experiences.
